Reaping Lunge.name: Reaping Lunge
Reaping Lunge.flavor: You make a long swing at your adversary, and your solid attack sends a clear message about the threat you represent.
Reaping Lunge.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the start of your next turn, if the target makes an attack that doesn’t include you as a target, you can shift 1 square and make a melee basic attack against the target as an immediate interrupt.
Reaping Lunge.weapon: If you’re wielding a two-handed weapon, the attack and the melee basic attack both deal extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Reaper’s Warning.name: Reaper’s Warning
Reaper’s Warning.flavor: Sweeping your weapon in a threatening arc, you force your foes to reassess their tactics.
Reaper’s Warning.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Reaper’s Warning.effect: The target is marked until the end of the encounter, until you are knocked unconscious, or until another mark supersedes this one.

Blood Harvest.name: Blood Harvest
Blood Harvest.flavor: Your series of vicious swipes leaves your enemies bleeding and in a bad spot.
Blood Harvest.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Blood Harvest.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends). If the target moves on its turn, it cannot make a saving throw against the ongoing damage.
Blood Harvest.weapon: If you’re wielding a two-handed weapon, the target instead takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
Blood Harvest.onMiss: Half damage, and no ongoing damage.
